Auth.title: Sign in
Auth.text: An email with an authorization code will be sent to you
Auth.text-code: We have sent a four-digit code to your Email {{email}}, enter it in the appropriate field and click "Continue"

text.firstParagraph: You have exceeded the maximum number of login attempts.

secondParagraph.firstPart: You can try logging in again in

Register.title: Registration
Register.success-desc: Thank you for signing up! You can now use the app.

Settings.title: Settings
Settings.msg-requireField: Please fill in the required fields

mention-company.title: Mention company
mention-company.mention-company-website: Use of company’s logo on CharityBo website/blog
mention-company.mention-company-linkedin: Mention company in CharityBo blog or LinkedIn posts

firstParagraph.firstPart: We are a devoted group of enthusiasts, including software developers and a graphic designer, united by our passion for making the world a better place through the power of software and design.
firstParagraph.boldText: Our mission is to utilize our collective skills and expertise to create innovative solutions that address the challenges faced by society.
firstParagraph.secondPart: Your support is crucial in helping us realize our vision, and we are truly grateful for your trust in our endeavors.

secondParagraph.firstPart: Our team consists of professional software developers with diverse skills and experiences in various technologies such as JavaScript, TypeScript, React, GraphQL, Serverless, Node.js, and AWS. We also have a talented graphic designer who can bring creative visual elements to your projects. If you ever require assistance with any of these areas, please do not hesitate to contact us at
secondParagraph.secondPart: We are eager to lend our expertise and collaborate with you on your projects.

mainText.thirdParagraph: Together, we can leverage the transformative potential of software and design to shape a brighter future. By supporting our efforts, you empower us to continue making a positive impact in the lives of those around us.

Calendar.title: Calendar

red.title: High
red.text: - with the red indicator, our capacity for bottle collection bookings is currently reached, and we are unable to accept new orders at this moment. We appreciate your understanding and encourage you to check back later for open booking slots.

yellow.title: Medium
yellow.text: - the yellow indicator signifies that our availability for bottle collection services is moderate. You can still book your office bottle pickup, but we recommend doing so as soon as possible to secure your spot.

green.title: Low
green.text: - when the indicator is green, it means we have a high availability for bottle collection bookings. This is the best time to schedule your office bottle pickup, ensuring a smooth and timely service.

Calendar.info-founds-text1: Please choose a charity to support. You can update this preference on the
Calendar.info-founds-text2: page at any time. Thank you for your support!

CompanyStatistics.form-desc: Fill out the form below to submit an export request
CompanyStatistics.success-desc: We will contact you as soon as possible using the contacts you specified

Companies.access-denied-title: You do not have access to this page

TransferMoney.text-generate: Do you want to generate check fro this transaction?

SuggestOrganization.name: Name
SuggestOrganization.success-desc: We will contact you as soon as possible using the contacts you specified

DeleteAddress.title: Delete this address?
DeleteAddress.text: After deleting an address, information about it and all events associated with it will be deleted. Are you sure you want to do this?

SuggestNewFeature.title: XL-pickup
SuggestNewFeature.text: We are currently testing new features which allows companies donate other items that require bigger car, such as furniture, computer hardware etc. If you are interested in taking part in this or have another suggestion how CharityBo can bring more values, please submit a feature activation request clicking the button below.
SuggestNewFeature.textareaPlaceholder: Please write a few words of what you would be interested to donate and another thoughts and suggestions.

requestAccepted.text: Our team will review your request and follow up with you via email to confirm activation of the feature. At the moment you can book XL-pickup using the standard ‘Order pickup’ button. Just mention in the comment that a bigger car is needed.

OrderBox.checkPicture: The capacity of the bin is 125 l and its internal dimensions are 38 x 35 x 75 cm. You can check the picture

errors.company-exist: The company already exists. New users must be added by your colleagues
errors.code-required: Enter the code from your email in the field above
errors.name-length: Name length must be less than 70 characters
errors.date-interval: start date must be before end date
errors.comment-length: Comment length must be less than 2000 characters
errors.address-length: Address length must be more than 1 word
errors.country-length: Country code length must be less than 3 characters
errors.iban-length: IBAN length must be less than 34 characters
errors.message-length: length must be less than 140 characters
errors.reference-length: length must be less than 25 characters
